Room.Name: Path by the Rockface
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a path between great boulders and rocks, near a rockface.
Room.LongDescription: The rockface rises at a steep angle, but looks safe to climb if you have the proper equipment. It's hard to tell what might be up there, as there is a rock shelf a few meters up. It looks like the fissures up there are big enough to enter, and they might prove interesting to explore.
